abstract member Trace : System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage * string * System.Web.Http.Tracing.TraceLevel * Action<System.Web.Http.Tracing.TraceRecord> -> unit

Docs.param: The current . It may be null but doing so will prevent subsequent trace analysis from correlating the trace to a particular request.
The logical category for the trace. Users can define their own.
The at which to write this trace.
The action to invoke if tracing is enabled. The caller is expected to fill in the fields of the given in this action.
Docs.summary: Invokes the specified traceAction to allow setting values in a new if and only if tracing is permitted at the given category and level.
